entry.def: The premiere of a new play or film is the first public performance of it.

example.ex: A new Czechoslovak film has had its premiere at the Karlovy Vary film festival.
example.tran: 一部捷克斯洛伐克新电影在卡罗维发利电影节上首映。

entry.def: When a film or show premieres or is premiered, it is shown to an audience for the first time.

example.ex: The documentary premiered at the Jerusalem Film Festival...
example.tran: 这部纪录片在耶路撒冷电影节首映。

example.ex: The opera is due to be premiered by ENO next year.
example.tran: 这部歌剧将于明年在英国国家歌剧院首演。

means.word_mean: 1. the first public performance of a play or movie
1. be performed for the first time;

sentences.sentence: "We premiered the opera of the young composer and it was a critical success"

means.word_mean: 2. perform a work for the first time
